mapper.insert: insert into authors(author_id, exhibition_id, gallery_id, author_name, author_picture, author_description, author_email, author_instagram) values(seq_author.NEXTVAL, #{exhibition_id}, #{gallery_id}, #{author_name}, #{author_picture}, #{author_description}, #{author_email}, #{author_instagram})
mapper.update: UPDATE authors SET author_valid = 0 WHERE author_name = #{author_name}

update authors set exhibition_id = #{exhibition_id}, gallery_id = #{gallery_id}, author_name = #{author_name}, author_picture = #{author_picture}, author_description = #{author_description}, author_email = #{author_email}, author_instagram = #{author_instagram} where author_id = #{author_id}
